TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OperationalizationClusterResource extends Azure.ResourceManager.ArmResource

Docs.summary: A Class representing an OperationalizationCluster along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct an from an instance of using the GetOperationalizationClusterResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetOperationalizationCluster method.
